title: Patch 7.7 Frame drop
body:
I have a very nice computer and have never had problems with League FPS before. Ping is at around 30-50 so it can't be that. Whenever for example a teamfight starts I start lagging like crazy. This is with lowest settings but somehow I can still play BF4 on Ultra without any lagg?

Riot, fix this please. Has been around for a few patches I found out when I did some research.

replies.body: Running task manager and closing the client while the game is loading fixed my input lag and crappy fps.  Sucks that the option to close client in the game menus doesn't deal with the problem caused by the client running in game.   Same problem on 7.10.
there is a option too close client while in game befor u log in go to the settings icon and under client/general  mark the box " close client during game" :P

But how do I know which task to close without the game crashing? 
Can you tell me how to find out?
I used to be able to play LoL at 144+fps , now its always stuck around at 120-180, I have a gtx 1060 and 4790k, the fps shouldnt be this low{{champion:83}}
I have same kind of problem with 4770k and gtx 780. Shoould be easy to get that stable 144fps :/
Same here, even in 7.8 the game looks as the 7.7 in terms of fps.. guess we need to wait for an optimization of some sort...

There could be some bad game files not rendering a particle or animation properly during a team fight, and causing frame drops.  Could be outdated drivers too, or something else!  My suggestion would be to use the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to troubleshoot and tune up your gameplay.  Test it in a custom game, and let me know if it turns out okay!

Hi, I got the same problem, already done every single step of the guide, but still didn't work, I don't know why I didn't come here first. Is Riot working in order to fix this? Already unninstalled and installed, but nothing works.

If the guide didn't work and you're still getting frame drops, also make sure you've disabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) if you are on Windows 10.  Some updates auto-enabled it which has given some players fps issues. 

Otherwise, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team will help.  Make sure to download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab some logs to attach to the ticket.  We'll get back to you!

Porocles.... Please. We've done everything you people recommend us. None of it works. This time it's on Riot's end, and if you guys don't fix this many people will stop playing. This is a problem. I have a **gtx 1060**, and when I engage in a teamfight my fps goes down from 300 to 40, 30, even 20. 20 fps Porocles! WITH A GTX 1060! Please, I really want to play your game. I just can't when I physically cannot play. You guys just keep saying oh maybe it's a particle that's not rendering or oh maybe it's outdated drivers. NO RIOT It's NOT! Since nobody else has the balls to speak up like this I guess I have to.
Ikr. None of it is our pc's. Its your patch. We've alrdy tried everything we can and none of it works.
Hey! I tried to disable the Xbox Game Bar but when i open the Xbox and go for settings the Xbox app crash. Can u help me with this?
That's strange, but I'd advise a restart just in case something crashed in the background.  If you continue to have any issues, hit us up in a ticket and we'll check it out!

Dude....... the game is unplayable since patch 7.7. I tried everything, i get huge fps drops, and the worst part is, when my charakter moves, or when I clikc left to right really fast, it laggs soemhow.. my ms is on 35, and my fps.. before patch 7.7 on 250+ .. I got a GTX 1050 TI and never had problems with any game or FPS.. its literally unplayable and drives me crazy.. I reinstalled league, i did the fps trouble shooting thingy, i tried every setting... i changed settings on my graphic cards nvdia thingy.. N O T H I N G works.. please fix this man.. I wanna play league! it lags tremedosly.. ( or how donald trumps calls it)
I had around 140 now i have around 60 i know it's still smooth but 80 fps drop is bad :/ . Iam running on AMD Radeon HD 7670M 2GB , i5 3230 quad core 2,66GHz , 8GB of ram
its only league that does this.. they know their servers are bad now and they wont fix it. was fine before patch 7.2 and then boom afterwards everyone has had lag/fps issues

Yeah I have the exact same issue. What you described is called "input lag". And that is from the heavy drops in FPS in game. I notice it mainly when running between or behind minions. My character will get stuck or teleport for a milisecond behind them. I have 40 ms and 120 fps current, on the legacy client I had 180-200 fps on high settings and the game ran flawlessly.. Please give us the option to use the legacy client. I don't understand how something like this has not been patched yet. This is 100% a client issue.

I think the problem is the new launcher...
I tried with a friend of mine who had the same fps problem (and is computer runs every new game on ultra) and we both turned off the launcher after the game started and got the missing fps back.
And btw even if you use the option to turn off the launcher when the game starts it doenst work because it leaves a process open that eats your fps and if you end it it gives back the fps.
The problem is that if you these things you get the fps back but you have to login back at the end of each game and cant even see the post game screen with the score and everythin....so please Riot fix this
And if someone tries the things i said here pls tell me if it also gave your fps back.

Edit: I sometimes also get some lag that looks like Ping lag my ping is always fine wich means that i dont know if it really is my internet that sucks or if it is caused by the launcher so again if anyone also has this problem and it got fixed by turning the launcher off pls tell me.

> [{quoted}](name=originalxpto,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EtkAHn0t,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-04-09T12:15:01.226+0000)
>
> I think the problem is the new launcher...
> I tried with a friend of mine who had the same fps problem (and is computer runs every new game on ultra) and we both turned off the launcher after the game started and got the missing fps back.
> And btw even if you use the option to turn off the launcher when the game starts it doenst work because it leaves a process open that eats your fps and if you end it it gives back the fps.
> The problem is that if you these things you get the fps back but you have to login back at the end of each game and cant even see the post game screen with the score and everythin....so please Riot fix this
> And if someone tries the things i said here pls tell me if it also gave your fps back.
> 
> Edit: I sometimes also get some lag that looks like Ping lag my ping is always fine wich means that i dont know if it really is my internet that sucks or if it is caused by the launcher so again if anyone also has this problem and it got fixed by turning the launcher off pls tell me.

I'm going to try this out. it's 100% the new client, legacy client the game ran like butter even on the highest settings.

And don't say: Turn off movement prediction. yes. it fixes it.. BUT i cant play like that.. feels like i would play on 150ms.. its so delayed, and i cant dodge anything with that.. i have to turn it on
Same problem for months. Have to play in low quality with a crazy PC. Every other game in ultra with super high  FPS

having the same problem  i have an i7700hg  ssd 8gb ddr4  gtx 1050  
enough for this game   even cald asus support
 tought something waz wrong with my  notebook send them benchmarks  
they  say theres nothing wrong with my product must be the game
please fix this
im running gtx 1080 and i get a steady 490-500 fps it does drop once in a while just gotta clean registry and do malware scan

I went so far as to install an additional 16 GB of RAM as well as defrag, virus scan, and update graphics drivers. Until the patch a couple months ago i ran at 60+ fps, but now i can barely make 20 fps, and it drops to like 3 to 8 if a team fight breaks out. Did everything the help page said to, didnt fix it. Every other game i have runs just fine but League is crapping its pants. Riot plz fix.

Wow for the past month I've been trying to fix this issue thinking it was my computer making my fps at 6 instead of 60. It did seem ridiculous as to how something like that would happen, so it being a patch issue seems a lot more likely. 

I at least found that if you disable sounds you can get at least half the fps back. I dislike playing at anything below 45 fps because it hurts my eyes though.

I think i have same issue ,but let me explain a little maybe that will help , i'm an owner of gaming center shop and i have 32 computers there , they all used to run LoL so smooth and no lags or FPS Drops at all most of the time , and the problem i just noticed today on my latest PCs under these Specs i7 7700 cpu , Asus GTX 1070 GPU  , 16 GB DDR4 hyperx ram , 240 GB SSD (Game is on SSD) ,1TB HDD (Tried it on HDD Too and same issue), 750 Evga PSU , i believe this computer should no lag at all on LoL because people in my shop play CS Go on those computers with 400-500 FPS and CSgo is known game with its FPS issues and Drops and it does no FPS drop at all on those PCs , we all know LoL before had like 300-400 FPS even on much less computers with GPUs like 760 and even 660 Ti or 560TI even 560 , 970 , 1060 , 780 i have all these cards in my shop and they all used to run the game with no troubles at all until today , don't tell me to get latest drivers because it's my job to fix such issues but with league of legends i can literally find no mistake at all but must be developers mistake there , Please fix this issue asap or just go back to the old launcher please .
Excactly its 7 may here and i play with 20 fps , i had 60-70 fps in game now 20 fps please riot do something i cannot play =)

Originally when 7.7 came out it was fine for me. BUT in last 3-5 days the game has become unplayable. I have 45ms consistently, I USED to have 60-80 FPS consistently. Now when I load into game I have 35 and when minions come to lane I'm lucky to have 12 fps. Plz help Rito.. I wanna play my God Fist Lee Sin DDD:

(BTW: I made sure to update all drivers and used the FPS troubleshooting guide. NO LUCK.)
SAME. RIOT FIX THIS

> [{quoted}](name=SkythRaze,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EtkAHn0t,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-04-16T04:03:33.104+0000)
>
> Originally when 7.7 came out it was fine for me. BUT in last 3-5 days the game has become unplayable. I have 45ms consistently, I USED to have 60-80 FPS consistently. Now when I load into game I have 35 and when minions come to lane I'm lucky to have 12 fps. Plz help Rito.. I wanna play my God Fist Lee Sin DDD:
> 
> (BTW: I made sure to update all drivers and used the FPS troubleshooting guide. NO LUCK.)


Same here Riot
Try disabling the IP helper in the services.

You're not the only one. A LOT of people are having the same issues ever since Patch came out. I tried everything too and still nothing. Have a ticket open but I don't think it'll help since its on Riots end.
